trans-unit.source: Cannot find a manifest file that contains package id '{0}'.
trans-unit.target: '{0}' paket kimliğini içeren bildirim dosyası bulunamıyor.

trans-unit.source: Uninstall a global tool or local tool.
trans-unit.target: Uninstall a global tool or local tool.

trans-unit.source: Uninstall the tool from the current user's tools directory.
trans-unit.target: Uninstall the tool from the current user's tools directory.

trans-unit.source: Uninstall the tool and remove it from the local tool manifest.
trans-unit.target: Uninstall the tool and remove it from the local tool manifest.

trans-unit.source: The NuGet Package Id of the tool to uninstall.
trans-unit.target: The NuGet Package Id of the tool to uninstall.

trans-unit.source: Specify one tool Package Id to uninstall.
trans-unit.target: Specify one tool Package Id to uninstall.

trans-unit.source: Tool '{0}' has multiple versions installed and cannot be uninstalled.
trans-unit.target: Tool '{0}' has multiple versions installed and cannot be uninstalled.

trans-unit.source:
A tool with the package Id '{0}' could not be found.
Tools are uninstalled using their package Id which may be different from the tool name you use when calling the tool. You can find the tool names and the corresponding package Ids for installed tools using the command 'dotnet tool list'.
trans-unit.target:
A tool with the package Id '{0}' could not be found.
Tools are uninstalled using their package Id which may be different from the tool name you use when calling the tool. You can find the tool names and the corresponding package Ids for installed tools using the command 'dotnet tool list'.

trans-unit.source: The directory containing the tool to uninstall.
trans-unit.target: The directory containing the tool to uninstall.

trans-unit.source: Tool '{0}' was successfully uninstalled and removed from manifest file {1}.
trans-unit.target: '{0}' aracı başarıyla kaldırıldı ve {1} bildirim dosyasından çıkarıldı.

trans-unit.source: The local option(--local), the global option (--global), the tool path option (--tool-path), can only have one at a time. Specify only one of the options: {0}.
trans-unit.target: Yerel seçeneği (--local), genel seçeneği (--global), araç yolu seçeneği (--tool-path) arasından yalnızca biri seçilebilir. Seçeneklerden yalnızca birini belirtin: {0}.
